messages.agent_message: I can also create a new account for you. Would you like to do that today?
Ok! No accounts will be created.
Would you like to e-transfer any money to your contacts?
No problem! No e-transfers will be sent.
You have a few outstanding bills. Would you like to pay them off now?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
messages.user_message: I want to pay off my lights payment.

messages.agent_message: Which account would you like to use?
Ok, I'm paying your lights bill from your savings account.
Are you expecting funds from any of your contacts?
How much money would you like to request and from who?
5000 were requested from Sandra. I'll notify you when the payment is received.
Would you like to transfer funds between accounts now?
All done. Have a nice day!
